## SARA Statistics Winter School

-   Around 30 hours of residential teaching for 5 days.

-   [No tuition fee.]{.clr-tom} But 1 week food & accommodation charges Rs.6000.

-   First 15 participants are given 40% discount on the food and accommodation fee as well.

- **Feedback** on the last day of the event.

-   **Thank You Ceremony!** on Friday, 20 Dec 2024, 6-7 PM üöÇ

- **e-Certificate** of the participation via email.
